meanings.definition: Microscopic fossils of plants or animals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study microfossils to learn about ancient life.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of microfossils found in the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microfossils whispered stories of the past to the curious researchers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microfossils, each tiny fragment holds a secret history.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the microfossils danced like miniature stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Fossils that are too small to be seen with the naked eye.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a powerful microscope to examine the microfossils.
meanings.sent2: Collecting microfossils requires patience and precision due to their size.
meanings.sent3: The detective of the fossil world, the microfossils solved mysteries invisible to the eye.
meanings.sent4: In the vast landscape of time, microfossils are the tiny footprints left behind.
meanings.sent5: The microfossils hid in plain sight, waiting for the keen observer to uncover their secrets.
